revised_title: A Detailed Account of a Thunderstorm's Effects on Two Houses in Stretham, Surrey
tldr: This article describes a thunderstorm that occurred in Stretham, Surrey, and the damage it caused to two nearby houses. The author provides a detailed account of the damage, including shattered glass, bent iron, and melted lead. The author also discusses the unique effect of the lightning on a painted panel of wainscot, where the gilding was stripped off, leaving the paint untouched.
